tool_description: API for Google Play Store Scrapper. Extract app details, reviews, and etc.
name: Google Play Store Scraper API
title: Google Play Store Scraper API

api_list.name: Search Apps
api_list.description: Get a list of apps that results of searching by the given term.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-play-store-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com/search-apps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-play-store-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get App Details
api_list.description: Get the full detail of an application.

api_list.name: Get Collection

api_list.name: Get Developer Applications

api_list.name: Get App Reviews
api_list.description: Get a reviews of a specific application. Limit is 100
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-play-store-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com/get-reviews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-play-store-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
